attributes.action: give us citizens the right to arm bears
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the United Kingdom, we the people no longer have the right to bear arms. To make up for this, we should be allowed to play around with the wording of the Bill of Rights 1689 and arm bears instead.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
